@graph.headline: Leveraging AI, Internal Linking & FAQs To Improve Shopify Collection Page Content & Google Rankings
@graph.description: We have been rather successful ranking Shopify collection pages in a variety of markets and niches over the last few years. We have a solid concept and strategy that has proven to improve collection pages in organic search. We’ve continued to refine the process and we’re tweaking and testing, looking for that extra edge constantly. […]
@graph.keywords: Shopify SEO, collection pages, AI content generation, internal linking, FAQ schema, horse toys, Google rankings, OptizenAI, ChatGPT, entity optimization
